Articles.Content:
I would like to see an advanced iva so you can walk trough your space station.

Also i would like to see more parts like space station cabins where you can walk through.

Hope this is specific enough and not to general for parts last time my thread got rejected

Well, the what not to suggest list says

* Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets

This sounds very similar.

as martin says, advance IVA / walking in parts are inside the what not to suggest list.

And for the parts 3-1 words cannot really be specific enough.

You do have good idea for the game, make sure you search for the words in the wnts list.

Example: IVA would have bring you directly to Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets.
